resources.string: Check your connection, input data or router settings. An error occurred:
Select a port, enter the maximum limit in megabits and press OK. \nFor unlimited speed enter 999. To turn the Internet off enter 0.
Select ports to add to parent network to connect TV / network printer / computer / access point by ethernet cable. Reconnect or reboot connected device after switching.

To connect the port to the Hotspot network press the button with a selected port name. Reconnect or reboot connected device after switching. If you turn off the selected port it will be in the parent network.

ImProvider enables you to control MikroTik routers through controlling router users' Internet speed limits. You can also create a Hotspot to connect users by tickets.
 
 How to use: 
 1. If you already use a Mikrotik router save its configuration with Winbox and reset it. 
 2. Plug the internet cable from provider's router into the first port (ETH1) or insert microSIM card (for LTE/5G routers). 
 3. Turn on the router. 
 4. Connect your phone or tablet with ImProvider to WiFi network "MikroTik-*****" . 
 
 
********************** 
 To delete the app settings on your router reset it. 
 You can find more information about ImProvider at https://mcsimple.net/improvider. If you have questions or want to report about an issue write to customercare@mcsimple.net. 
 We are not responsible for any harm done by using ImProvider. Pressing CONTINUE you agree with it.
Enter Hotspot Wi-Fi network name, the maximum speed limit in megabits and press OK. For unlimited speed enter 999. To turn the Internet off enter 0. You cannot manage your router over Hotspot Wi-Fi.

To set up a new router, click 
ROUTER MANAGEMENT button.

Need help?

* A Wi-Fi network where you can add users and manage their access time using a ticket system. The speed limit will be the same for every user. You can add network ports to connect access points and increase the range of the network.
Create separate network on each port

*Create a separate network on each port of your router. You can control the speed limits. The networks are separated from each other and the parent network. You cannot manage your router from them. It is possible to reassign some ports to the parent network.
Here you can configure Wi-Fi part of your parent network and admin\'s password. You can enter a new name, a wi-fi password and an admin\'s password or leave them as they are and press OK
